content: It's great to hear that you're taking steps to reduce your social media use and taking time for yourself. Some studies have shown that excessive social media use can have negative impacts on our mental health and overall wellbeing. Finding a healthy balance between our online and offline lives can help us prioritize our mental health and improve our quality of life. It's important to remember that social media is just one aspect of our lives, and sometimes taking a step back can help us reconnect with ourselves and those around us.
